data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original book / thesis / monograph Jocqué, R., Dippenaar-Schoman, A. S. (2006): Spider families of the World (Excerpt). Tervuren: Kininklijk Museum voor Midden-Afrika, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publicaitons/JocqueDippenaarSchoeman2006Excerpt/JocqueDippenaarSchoeman2006Excerpt.pdf
